page.title: 11WEATHER
page.content: Summer starts here about the end of June! July August and September are the warmest months of the year. Autumn is long and draion out and the winter weather starts about mid November. Sometimes a mild spell follows and then the winter storms strike about February. Sometimes these storms can be violent blocking roads and cuttinng off farms in remoter areas, but they don't last long. The cold weather does,and snow falls as late as April with severe night frosts. Last year the rainfall was 95.57cms. Sunshine averaged 3_4 hrs per day,and the best months were April and May. This year the trend seems to be slightly different, with a snow storm at the end of April.This weather makes the season for the farmers very short.
